You may optionally provide some demographic information for statistical purposes. No personally identifiable data is collected or shared. Translations are handled through external services.
settings.disclaimerContent:
IMPORTANT: AllergiApp is a communication tool and does NOT replace medical advice.

The app does not guarantee the completeness of information, absence of cross-contamination, or correct understanding by staff.

In case of severe allergies: always carry prescribed medications, always inform staff verbally, and do not rely solely on this app.

The user assumes all responsibility for using the application. Developers are not liable for allergic reactions or damages resulting from the use of the app.

aboutStory.title: Why is it free?
aboutStory.intro: This app was born from personal experience. As someone with food allergies, I've always loved traveling and discovering new cultures through food.
aboutStory.paragraph1: During my travels, I learned that language barriers can turn a dining experience into a moment of anxiety. I started handwriting small cards listing my allergies, then printing them, and discovered how invaluable they were for communicating with waiters and chefs who didn't speak my language.
aboutStory.paragraph2: One simple gesture—showing a card—changed everything. Restaurant staff appreciated the clarity, I felt safer, and I could finally enjoy local cuisine without fear.
aboutStory.paragraph3: I created AllergiApp to bring this solution to anyone who needs it. It's free because traveling and enjoying the world's food should be a right for everyone, not a privilege.
aboutStory.paragraph4: If this app helps even one person enjoy an extra meal while traveling, it will have achieved its purpose.
aboutStory.paragraph5: If you appreciate this project and want to support it, every contribution helps cover development and maintenance costs, keeping it free and improving it over time. ❤️
aboutStory.quoteText: My mission? Make the world more accessible and help people with allergies explore it through food—safely and joyfully.
